statement.name: INSERT_SMANMA
statement.sql: INSERT INTO SMANMA (NRONMA, TPONMA, TPOPRS, CODNMA, NOMNMA, STDNMA, NROLEG, EXENMA, DIANMA, FCHNMA, AGNNMA, SQLBKR) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMANMA
statement.sql: UPDATE SMANMA SET TPONMA=?, TPOPRS=?, CODNMA=?, NOMNMA=?, STDNMA=?, NROLEG=?, EXENMA=?, DIANMA=?, FCHNMA=?, AGNNMA=?, SQLBKR=? WHERE NRONMA=?
